title: Besides Neil Young, which member of CSNY has a successful solo career? - Quora

response.answer_text: Stephen Stills. He was, according to Richie Furay, the “heart and soul” of Buffalo Springfield in the late 1960s. He was the core around which Crosby and Nash supported multiple albums at various times through 1970s and 1980s. In between he led another band named Manassas, and has carried a successful solo career charting top ten hits. In addition he played as a guest musician on ensemble projects for George Harrison and Ringo Starr, to name just two. The guy’s guitar work is incredible and inventive, and his songs are powerful yet intimate. Good stuff.
